channel.title: Cloudbase LABS
channel.description: CloudbaseLABS is a training program developed by Cloudbase Solutions in the fields of Python programming, OpenStack and DevOps technologies and practices.

item.title: CloudbaseLABS through the eyes of Adelina and Ionuț
item.description: One day left to apply for CloudbaseLABS in Iași. We’d like to give you more impressions from former participants, both of which have become important contributors of open-source projects and trainers in projects such as these.

item.title: From an idea to a Nobel prize in 50 years with the help of open-source
item.description: We want to use the last days of applications to share with you some of the projects we are working on and how contributing to open-source can have a huge impact on society.

item.title: Cloudbase Iași office - Instructions on how to get there!
item.description: We wanted to give you more info on how to reach our office, in case you don’t know exactly where it is.

item.title: Pictures from our Board Games Night event
item.description: We’re glad so many of you joined us for our board games night event at our office in Iași.

item.title: Board Games night @Cloudbase Iași Office
item.description: We’d like to invite you to join us on Saturday night, starting from 6 PM, for a board games night at our office.

item.title: Cloudbase LABS through the eyes of a former participant!
item.description: Today we want to share with you the experience of Nashwan, a Cloud Engineer at Cloudbase Solutions and a former applicant of our workshops from the LigaAC LABS project.

item.title: Cloudbase LABS interview information!
item.description: If you’re reading this it means that you’ve applied or you’re thinking of applying to our Cloudbase LABS workshops in Iași.

item.title: Cloudbase LABS applications are open!
item.description: The applications for Cloudbase LABS are now open in Iași. If you are a student, apply until January 23 for a chance to attend a two week Python and DevOps workshop held by our colleagues from the Cloudbase team.
